src package¶

Submodules¶

src.myconfig module¶

src.myconfig.get_config(filepath)[소스]¶

Get config parser. :param filepath: a config filepath to read. :type filepath: str :return: a parser (Use it like a “dictionary”) :rtype: configparser.SafeConfigParser

src.mylogger module¶

src.mylogger.get_logger(name, log_directory='', log_to_stream=True)[소스]¶

Create a new logger and return it. :param name: name of logger. :type name: str :param log_directory: a path to make log files. If it is empty, then it does not write log files. :type log_directory: str :param log_to_stream: whether if we want to write log messages to streams (e.g., screen). :type log_to_stream: bool :return: a logger :rtype: logging.Logger

src.user module¶

src.user.add_schedule(doc_user, date, schedule, logger)[소스]¶

add one or more schedule to the user’s list.

매개 변수:
  • doc_user – user document (DB)
  • date (str) – date
  • event (list) – event list to add
  • logger (logging.Logger) – logger instance
반환:

True or False added day events
반환 형식:

bool
src.user.check_passwd(userid, passwd)[소스]¶

Check if the password is correct or not.

매개 변수:
  • userid (str) – user ID
  • passwd (str) – password
반환:

user document (DB) or False
반환 형식:

dict or bool
src.user.check_professor(doc_user)[소스]¶

return check you are a professor

매개 변수:doc_user – user document (DB)
반환:True or False
반환 형식:bool
src.user.check_session(session_id, timestamp, elapse_limit=600)[소스]¶

Check if the session is valid.

매개 변수:
  • session_id (str) – session ID
  • timestamp (float) – timestamp (usually, this is current timestamp)
  • elapse_limit (int) – time limit for checking session validity
반환:

user document (DB) or False
반환 형식:

dict or bool
src.user.convert_to_SHA256(x)[소스]¶

Convert a given string to SHA256-encoded string.

매개 변수:x (str) – arbitrary string.
반환:SHA256 encoded string
반환 형식:str
src.user.convert_to_bson_timestamp(ts)[소스]¶

Convert a given timestamp (of datetime) to bson Timestamp.

매개 변수:ts (float) – datetime timestamp
반환:bson Timestamp
반환 형식:bson.timestamp.Timestamp

Generate session key.

매개 변수:doc_user (dict) – user’s document (DB)
반환:session key dictionary
반환 형식:dict
src.user.login(user_id, passwd, logger)[소스]¶

Login.

매개 변수:

  • passwd (str) – password
  • logger (logging.Logger) – Logger instance
반환:

session_key or False
반환 형식:

src.user.show_daySchedule(doc_user, date, logger)[소스]¶

return schedule for the date selected by the user.

매개 변수:
  • doc_user – user document (DB)
  • date (datetime) – selected date
  • logger (logging.Logger) – logger instance
반환:

a list of chosen date schedules
반환 형식:

list
